item.title: Explorers End
item.description: This work of fiction started as a idea tooted on mastodon. Hope you enjoy. “Reload complete.” The log message in its mind stated. It often wondered what happened to it during a warp jump before its mind state was automatically reloaded when it dropped back into normal space. It knew and understood why the protocols were in place. A machine like its self corrupted by the warp was not something to release on the universe.
